connectorUiConfig.title: DataBahn
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [DataBahn](https://databahn.ai/) connector provides the capability to push real-time platform telemetry from your DataBahn environment directly into Microsoft Sentinel using the Codeless Connector Framework (CCF) Push pattern. This connector ingests audit logs, operational alerts, and device inventory into custom Log Analytics tables for analysis, alerting, and visualization.

dataTypes.name: databahn_audit_logs_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
databahn_audit_logs_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: databahn_alerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
databahn_alerts_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: databahn_device_inventory_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
databahn_device_inventory_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
databahn_audit_logs_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(7d)

customs.name: Microsoft Azure

instructionSteps.title: 1. Create ARM Resources and Provide the Required Permissions
instructionSteps.description: This connector enables your DataBahn platform to push audit logs, alerts, and device inventory directly to Microsoft Sentinel via the Azure Monitor Ingestion API.

parameters.content:
#### Automated Configuration and Secure Data Ingestion with Entra Application 
Clicking on "Deploy" will trigger the creation of Log Analytics tables and a Data Collection Rule (DCR). 
It will then create an Entra application, link the DCR to it, and set the entered secret in the application. This setup enables data to be sent securely to the DCR using an Entra token.
